greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (theta_3(q) * theta_3(q^27) + theta_2(q) * theta_2(q^27) - 1) / 2 in powers of q.
comment: Half the number of integer solutions to x^2 + x*y + 7*y^2 = n. - _Jianing Song_, Nov 20 2019
formula: a(n) is multiplicative and a(3^e) = 3 if e>1, a(p^e) = e+1 if p == 1 (mod 6), a(p^e) = (1 + (-1)^e) / 2 if p == 5 (mod 6).
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, if( n%3 == 2, 0, if( n%3==1, sumdiv(n, d, kronecker(-3, d)), if( n%9==0, 3 * sumdiv(n/9, d, kronecker(-3, d))))))}
xref: Cf. A138805 (number of integer solutions to x^2 + x*y + 7*y^2 = n).
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Mar 30 2008
